Message:
I was just about to give up hope,
but to think I’d bump into
the wielder of the angel’s Staff
all the way out here.

This must also be the work
of my guardian angel!

I’m not from this world.
But, you all must still be
in the same boat as me, right?

On a journey to find
the underworld to defeat
the demon lord.

That was my group’s goal, too.
My angel lord Samyaza chose
my two friends to be
the Hero of the Staff and
the Hero of the Lance.

To fulfill their destinies as
the chosen ones, they set out
on a journey with me and
four other witches.

But, partway through
our journey,
we all got separated...

So, would you mind if I joined
you guys on your travels?

If we have the same goal in mind,
I’m sure I’ll be able to run into
them again if I stick with you.
